GSD.description:
video: fbdev: nvidiafb: Use strscpy() to prevent buffer overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 6a5226e544ac043bb2d8dc1bfe8920d02282f7cd. For more details please see the references link.
